nodes.text: An Holographic tactical display was a heads up display designed for starships.

Mounted between the viewport and the flight controls as to overlay the pilots vision as he flies, the holographic tactical display was capable of vastly improving a pilots ability to maneuver a starship, which was essential when navigating an asteroid field or in close combat. A more combat based tactical display was used in the Bes'uliik, with the display allowing for enhanced targeting, tracking, and systems access and readout with a glance of the eye.
